name: FantasyFootballNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get a flash briefing from Let's Talk Fantasy Football on the latest NFL and Fantasy Football news.

The feed includes NFL & Fantasy Football Headlines only and will give you a brief overview of what's going on in the football world.

On Sunday mornings you can hear all of the injury news to make sure your lineup is ready for to win big!

Some of the NFL News you can expect includes: 
- Coach highlights.
- NFL & Fantasy football relevant injuries.
- Insider updates from those close to the NFL Teams.
- Trade rumors, training camp cuts and other roster changes. 

With the Let's Talk Fantasy Football News Alexa Skill and all of our other fantasy football alexa skills, you can always talk fantasy football.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
